TPS0xIRM2Vg8cOeZ.name: Sharing Swig
TPS0xIRM2Vg8cOeZ.description:
Requirements: A healing potion, a hand free

You quickly down half the potion and administer the other half to an ally in an adjacent space, expending it. Roll the healing done by the potion normally. You and your chosen ally each heal for half that much.
